title: Cant move/buy items
body: Greetings, For the past two days I have been repeatedly clicking items over and over to purchase them in the shop (10-15 clicks) and I find my right click (move button) to  stop working at times. This makes the game very frustrating when you randomly can't move and get stuck in the middle of the map. Also have been experiencing extreme lag spikes. My internet is fine. The only thing working properly is my attack click move button. But other than that, the game has been a mess the last two days. Any similar issues or ideas on how to solve this madness?

replies.body: The issue here may be network related, so reinstalling the game wouldn't necessarily fix this.  I recommend going through our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

>
> Tried reinstalling- nothing.

I have this same problem and I just cant play anymore. This is the only thread i've seen with a similar problem and I don't know what to do. I did nothing to my league client or computer, this sucks :(

A constant connection is required while in-game to communicate information, otherwise you'll experience input delays and even disconnections.  Run a[ log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get an overview of what's going wrong.  It will also provide a list of steps specific to your issue for a resolution.  Let me know if you run into any issues afterwards!

I ran my logs as well as the Hextech Repair Tool and everything is still the same. I see everything going on around me but my clicks wont go through. Its not with my mouse as i've tried different ones of as well as my laptop track pad. It will sometimes not let me move for a couple of seconds or sometimes it might just skip one of my movement commands.

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this and figure out what's going on.  I also recommend using our[ hextech repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)to gather a set of logs for context, and attach it to the ticket.  We'll respond asap!
